languages.text: "Однажды тебя не станет, твоя плоть станет прахом, и даже само имя твое сотрется из памяти живущих. Но твое наследие будет жить. В Схола Прогениум, основанной на Даргонусе, будут воспитывать новых воинов Его, несущих те же идеалы, что и нес{mf||ла} ты когда-то".

"One day, you will be gone, your flesh will turn to dust, and even your very name will disappear from the memory of the living. But your legacy will live on. At the Schola Progenium on Dargonus, new warriors in His service will be trained to uphold the same ideals that you upheld before them."
languages.original_text: "Однажды тебя не станет, твоя плоть станет прахом, и даже само имя твое сотрется из памяти живущих. Но твое наследие будет жить. В Схола Прогениум, основанной на Даргонусе, будут воспитывать новых воинов Его, несущих те же идеалы, что и нес{mf||ла} ты когда-то".

traits.locale_text: "One day, you will be gone, your flesh will turn to dust, and even your very name will disappear from the memory of the living. But your legacy will live on. At the Schola Progenium on Dargonus, new warriors in His service will be raised to uphold the same ideals that you upheld before them."

"One day, you will be gone, your flesh will turn to dust, and even your very name will disappear from the memory of the living. But your legacy will live on. At the Schola Progenium on Dargonus, new warriors in His service will be raised to uphold the same ideals that you upheld before them."

"One day, you will be gone, your flesh will turn to dust, and even your very name will disappear from the memory of the living. But your legacy will live on. At the Schola Progenium on Dargonus, new warriors in His service will be trained to uphold the same ideals that you upheld before them."

"One day, you will be gone, your flesh will turn to dust, and even your very name will disappear from the memory of the living. But your legacy will live on. At the Schola Progenium on Dargonus, new warriors in His service will be trained to uphold the same ideals that you upheld before them."

"One day, you will be gone, your flesh will turn to dust, and even your very name will disappear from the memory of the living. But your legacy will live on. At the Schola Progenium on Dargonus, new warriors in His service will be trained to uphold the same ideals that you upheld before them."

languages.text: "Eines Tages werdet Ihr fort und Euer Fleisch zu Staub zerfallen sein. Dann wird selbst Euer Name aus dem Gedächtnis der Lebenden verschwinden. Euer Vermächtnis wird aber weiterleben. An der Schola Progenium auf Dargonus werden neue Krieger ausgebildet, um Ihm zu dienen und die Ideale zu vertreten, die Ihr vor ihnen hochgehalten habt."
languages.original_text: "One day, you will be gone, your flesh will turn to dust, and even your very name will disappear from the memory of the living. But your legacy will live on. At the Schola Progenium on Dargonus, new warriors in His service will be trained to uphold the same ideals that you upheld before them."

traits.locale_text: "Eines Tages werdet Ihr fort und Euer Fleisch zu Staub zerfallen sein. Dann wird selbst Euer Name aus dem Gedächtnis der Lebenden verschwinden. Euer Vermächtnis wird aber weiterleben. An der Schola Progenium auf Dargonus werden neue Krieger ausgebildet, um Ihm zu dienen und die Ideale zu vertreten, die Ihr vor ihnen hochgehalten habt."

languages.text: « Un jour, vous mourrez, votre chair deviendra poussière et votre nom lui-même s'effacera de la mémoire des vivants. Mais votre héritage vous survivra. Au sein de la Schola Progenium, sur Dargonus, de nouveaux guerriers à Son service seront formés pour défendre les idéaux que vous aurez portés avant eux. »
languages.original_text: "One day, you will be gone, your flesh will turn to dust, and even your very name will disappear from the memory of the living. But your legacy will live on. At the Schola Progenium on Dargonus, new warriors in His service will be trained to uphold the same ideals that you upheld before them."

traits.locale_text: « Un jour, vous mourrez, votre chair deviendra poussière et votre nom lui-même s'effacera de la mémoire des vivants. Mais votre héritage vous survivra. Au sein de la Schola Progenium, sur Dargonus, de nouveaux guerriers à Son service seront formés pour défendre les idéaux que vous aurez portés avant eux. »

languages.text: 「いつの日か、あなたはこの世を去り、肉体は塵と化し、その名前さえも生者の記憶から消えるだろう。しかし、あなたの遺産は生き続ける。ダルゴナスの帝国教導院では、主に仕える新たな戦士たちが、あなたと同じ理想を掲げるよう訓練されるのだ」
languages.original_text: "One day, you will be gone, your flesh will turn to dust, and even your very name will disappear from the memory of the living. But your legacy will live on. At the Schola Progenium on Dargonus, new warriors in His service will be trained to uphold the same ideals that you upheld before them."

traits.locale_text: 「いつの日か、あなたはこの世を去り、肉体は塵と化し、その名前さえも生者の記憶から消えるだろう。しかし、あなたの遺産は生き続ける。ダルゴナスの帝国教導院では、主に仕える新たな戦士たちが、あなたと同じ理想を掲げるよう訓練されるのだ」

languages.text: «Algún día morirá, su carne se convertirá en polvo e incluso su nombre se desvanecerá de la memoria de los vivos. Pero su legado perdurará. En la Schola Progenium de Dargonus, los nuevos guerreros a Su servicio entrenarán para defender los mismos ideales por los que usted lucha ahora».
languages.original_text: "One day, you will be gone, your flesh will turn to dust, and even your very name will disappear from the memory of the living. But your legacy will live on. At the Schola Progenium on Dargonus, new warriors in His service will be trained to uphold the same ideals that you upheld before them."

traits.locale_text: «Algún día morirá, su carne se convertirá en polvo e incluso su nombre se desvanecerá de la memoria de los vivos. Pero su legado perdurará. En la Schola Progenium de Dargonus, los nuevos guerreros a Su servicio entrenarán para defender los mismos ideales por los que usted lucha ahora».

languages.text: “总有一天你会消失。你的肉体会化为尘土，甚至连你的名字也会被人遗忘。然而，你留下的遗产将永垂不朽。在达戈努斯的忠嗣学院中，无数新的战士接受训练，为神皇效力，在前人理想的道路上不断前行。”
languages.original_text: "One day, you will be gone, your flesh will turn to dust, and even your very name will disappear from the memory of the living. But your legacy will live on. At the Schola Progenium on Dargonus, new warriors in His service will be trained to uphold the same ideals that you upheld before them."

traits.locale_text: “总有一天你会消失。你的肉体会化为尘土，甚至连你的名字也会被人遗忘。然而，你留下的遗产将永垂不朽。在达戈努斯的忠嗣学院中，无数新的战士接受训练，为神皇效力，在前人理想的道路上不断前行。”
